display_long_description:
# Uncover the Mythical World of Epyka in a Stunning VR Adventure!
Embark on a breathtaking quest to solve mankind’s oldest mystery. 
When your father leaves you his Light Crystal, you and your trusty companion Jack set sail to find humanity’s lost civilization—Epyka. 
[media]
Explore a vibrant, Pixar-like world of sunlit beaches, shadowy caves, and volcanic depths. Face clever puzzles, wield supernatural powers, and battle an ancient evil lurking below. 

Will you prove the doubters wrong and claim your destiny?


# Reviews


- "Everything looks great" - Upload VR
- “A beautiful entry point for first-time puzzle-adventure gamers, 
and a breath of fresh air for adventure game veterans seeking a lighter, well-crafted experience” - Upload VR
- “A delightful story ... in a beautifully designed mysterious island.” - The VR Realm
